name: THE STEPHEN SCHOOL FOR THE DEAF & APHASIC

address: NEXT TO SIDDHIVINAYAK MANDIR, S.K.BOLE ROAD, PRABHADEVI

briefDescription: The Stephen High School For the Deaf and Aphasic was established in 1957. It is an aided Christian Minority School administered by the Society of the Montfort Brothers of St.Gabriel. It is recognised by the Maharashtra state Board. It is a Special School educating the differently abled children. The School prepares the hearing impaired children for the Secondary School certificate examination. The medium of instruction is English.The Institution has the tradition and noble cause to educate the Deaf and Mute - the poorest of the poor and emphasize on the education of the girl child. The School owes it present prestigious position to the pioneer Mrs. Nancy DeSa, The Montfort Brothers of St. Gabriel, Teachers and Parents who have nourished it
